recipe.title: Cucumber Salad
ingredients: 2 tablespoons fine-quality dried shrimp such as BDMP or Sea Emperor brands (optional)
2 tablespoons nam pla (Asian fish sauce; preferably Thai)
2 seedless cucumbers (usually plastic-wrapped; 1 1/2 lb total), halved lengthwise and sliced crosswise 1/8 inch thick
instructions: Finely grind shrimp (if using) in a blender until very fluffy, about 1 minute. Stir together lime juice, sugar, and fish sauce in a large bowl until sugar is dissolved, then add cucumber and shallot, tossing to coat.
